name: Huohuo
story: A trainee Ten-Lords Commission Judge of the Xianzhou Luofu, she is a young foxian girl possessed by a heliobus.She is a timid and weak girl who is afraid of all kinds of strange things, but is responsible for luring and subduing evil spirits.

skills.name: Banner: Stormcaller
skills.description: Deals minor Wind DMG to a single enemy.

skills.name: Talisman: Protection
skills.description: Dispels 1 debuff from an ally and restore HP to that ally and their adjacent allies.

skills.name: Tail: Spiritual Domination
skills.description: Regenerates Energy for all allies (excluding this character) and increases their ATK.

skills.name: Possession: Ethereal Metaflow
skills.description: Huohuo gains Divine Provision after using her Skill. If Huohuo possesses Divine Provision when an ally's turn starts or when an ally uses Ultimate, restores the ally's HP. At the same time, every ally with low HP receives healing once. When Divine Provision is triggered to heal an ally, dispel 1 debuff from that ally.

skills.name: Fiend: Impeachment of Evil
skills.description: Causes surrounding enemies to become Horror-Struck. After entering battle with enemies afflicted with Horror-Struck, there is a high chance applying ATK reduction on the enemy targets.

eidolons.name: Anchored to Vessel, Specters Nestled
eidolons.description: The duration of Divine Provision produced by the Talent is extended by 1 turn(s). When Huohuo possesses Divine Provision, all allies' SPD increases by 12%.

eidolons.name: Sealed in Tail, Wraith Subdued
eidolons.description: If Huohuo possesses Divine Provision when an ally is struck by a killing blow, the ally will not be knocked down, and their HP will immediately be restored by an amount equal to 50% of their Max HP. This reduces the duration of Divine Provision by 1 turn. This effect can only be triggered 2 time(s) per battle.

eidolons.name: Cursed by Fate, Moths to Flame
eidolons.description: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

eidolons.name: Tied in Life, Bound to Strife
eidolons.description: When healing a target ally via Skill or Talent, the less HP the target ally currently has, the higher the amount of healing they will receive. The maximum increase in healing provided by Huohuo is 80%.

eidolons.name: Mandated by Edict, Evils Evicted
eidolons.description: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

eidolons.name: Woven Together, Cohere Forever
eidolons.description: When healing a target ally, increases the target ally's DMG dealt by 50% for 2 turn(s).
